name: Player vs. Game
description:
The game is crazy. It's trying to stop you and it's glitching everything on its way. You will need to get to your goals while the game lags you, rotates the screen or opens the Pause menu so you get killed.

If you play the multiplayer mode, Player vs. Game challenges one player to make it to the goal and the other one to take on the role of the game to put an end to the player's life.

NEW 1.2.0 VERSION OUT (Medals, new menus and fixes added).

Compatible with controller.

You can play Player vs. Game by yourself in the single player mode, but we highly recommend that you play with a friend of yours.

@SurfingMoai
